subject: Re: Thanks, we accepted your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
 
$201,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this elementary form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://duplejkxiformrx.com/
